subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Last October, Jim Stewart was among the 15,000 people who entered a contest to win the naming rights to the Nascar Nextel Cup Series race. The Jim Stewart 400 will take place Saturday.
snippet: Last October, Jim Stewart was among the 15,000 people who entered a contest to win the naming rights to the Nascar Nextel Cup Series race. The Jim Stewart 400 will take place Saturday.
